entry.title: A few new year's resolutions
entry.content:
Just gonna put them out there:

  • Exercise more. I am looking at bikes on Craigslist, and am shooting for a stationary setup in our attic (w/ ubuntu box for netflix…). I also want to hack an arduino to record and track workout statistics.
  • Actually write this blog. Let’s say 3 posts a week; might take a while to get warmed up however.
  • Do a better job studying physics. I could be doing much more with material from my classes.
  • Spin off some project ideas into something real and useable (ie, outside my imagination). Maybe try to turn one of them into something people would buy.
  • Read more. Book suggestions welcome.
  • Have fun!
